title: Optimisation Techniques in Fuzzy Systems
description: A curated collection of 10 research papers used in a literature review for COMP4037 coursework, covering optimisation techniques in fuzzy systems.

papers.title: Gradient-based Fuzzy System Optimisation via Automatic Differentiation – FuzzyR as a Use Case
papers.abstract: Integration of automatic differentiation into FuzzyR toolbox using Torch for R. Achieves improved RMSE and classification on the Iris dataset using Mamdani-type models.

papers.title: Optimize TSK Fuzzy Systems for Regression Problems: MBGD-RDA
papers.abstract: Applies minibatch gradient descent with regularization and AdaBound to TSK-type fuzzy systems, improving MSE over genetic algorithms.

papers.title: Gradient–Evolutionary Hybrid Optimisation for Fuzzy Controllers
papers.abstract: Combines gradient pre-tuning with evolutionary refinement for fuzzy controllers, reducing steady-state error in robotic control tasks.

papers.title: Online Bagging of Evolving Fuzzy Systems
papers.abstract: Applies online bagging to evolving fuzzy models for streaming data. Improves real-time traffic prediction and adapts to concept drift.

papers.title: Learning of Type-2 Fuzzy Systems Using Simulated Annealing
papers.abstract: Optimises interval and general type-2 fuzzy controllers via simulated annealing within a bagging framework. Improved benchmark performance.

papers.title: Adaptive Boosting in Fuzzy Fault Detection
papers.abstract: Uses adaptive boosting to correct fuzzy system errors for fault detection. Increases sensitivity and overall classification metrics.

papers.title: Gradient-Boosted Fuzzy Systems with Ensemble Pruning
papers.abstract: Boosting approach with ensemble pruning improves accuracy in financial time-series forecasting using fuzzy models.

papers.title: Fuzzy-Decision Tree Stacked Model for Energy Forecasting
papers.abstract: Stacking fuzzy models with decision trees reduces MAE and improves feature interpretability for energy consumption forecasting.

papers.title: Hybrid Genetic-Stacking Model for Yield Prediction
papers.abstract: Genetic algorithms optimise stacking weights for fuzzy models in agricultural yield prediction, improving RMSE and R².

papers.title: Stacked Fuzzy Neural Networks for Medical Diagnosis
papers.abstract: Fuzzy neural networks combined with stacking meta-learners enhance interpretability and F1 score on diagnosis datasets.
